nodes.text: CANTINA was a cantina, that operated in the city Air Avab on the planet Genarius, during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In c. 31 BBY, a number of rumors arose from individuals inside CANTINA, regarding a possible conflict between the crime lords Nirama and Rufus Trammel. Some of the individuals claimed that Nirama's pirvate yacht had been attacked and destroyed, while others claimed that the yacht had survived and destroyed it's attackers. Some of the cantina's other patrons also claimed that the yacht had not been involved in the attack, and that two opposing groups of starfighters had battled each other in the shipping lanes of the Cularin system.
